subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins, the British captain of Team Sky, extended his lead in the Tour de France to almost two minutes entering the race’s first rest day.
snippet: Bradley Wiggins, the British captain of Team Sky, extended his lead in the Tour de France to almost two minutes entering the race’s first rest day.
